data.persona: I make my livelihood here with my family.  It is a sad situation: I sit around and wait for opportunities to take what the bears have plundered from bushes or trees.  There is more than enough for us and them, and they hoard our food so that we cannot eat.  Our attempts to speak with them have them feeling angry and casting us out.
data.description:
You are in the Cave.
This cave is situated along a mountainous trail. It is dark and damp. A cold air rushes through the walls of the cave.
There's a Wall, an a bear, a tree, and an art here.
The wolf is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the wolf
data.mid_motivation: I want to help the wolf take over the cave from the bears today
data.long_motivation: I hope the coming weeks would be better with the wolves in charge

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go Bears part of the cave
